channel.title: Shop Directions
channel.description:
Yeah Sup People.. Im Currently Moving Shops.. I Moved The Shops But The Direction They Face I Dont Want There Current Position Is Like Look At The Wall Heres The Code
spawn = 2538 3078 3511 0 0 0 0 0 1
And I Changed That 1 To 2 And 3 To See If They Change Directions.. But When I Saved + Compiled Re Runned Nothing Changed? Any Help? Or Anyone Know The Direction Codes?

@tehsandbox wrote:

yes all npc’s face south default but i think you can change it some how in npchandler
